sentences.sContent: If you don't have cucumbers, get creative–other vegetables such as cauliflower, carrots, or zucchini will make just as wonderful pickles!
sentences.sContent_eng: If you don't have cucumbers, get creative–other vegetables such as cauliflower, carrots, or zucchini will make just as wonderful pickles!
sentences.sCn: 如果你没有黄瓜，发挥创意吧——其它蔬菜像花椰菜、胡萝卜或南瓜也一样可以做出极好的泡菜！

sentences.sContent: Also included in the green group of vegetables are broccoli, Brussels sprouts, and cabbage, which are, like cauliflower, cruciferous vegetables and contain powerful carcinogen blockers.
sentences.sContent_eng: Also included in the green group of vegetables are broccoli, Brussels sprouts, and cabbage, which are, like cauliflower, cruciferous vegetables and contain powerful carcinogen blockers.
sentences.sCn: 椰菜、抱子甘蓝和卷心菜也属于绿色组蔬菜，像菜花那样，都是十字花科蔬菜并且含有强有效的致癌物质阻断剂。

sentences.sContent: Other great choices are veggies from the cruciferous family, which include cauliflower and Brussels sprouts. And, you can try new ways to use these vegetables.
sentences.sContent_eng: Other great choices are veggies from the cruciferous family, which include cauliflower and Brussels sprouts. And, you can try new ways to use these vegetables.
sentences.sCn: 另一种非常好的选择是花类蔬菜，包括花椰菜和布鲁塞尔豆芽，你也可用新方法制作这些蔬菜。

trans.tranOther: a vegetable with green leaves around a firm white centre
